com.github.cuter44.wxpay.servlet

类 GetOpenId

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.github.cuter44.wxpay.servlet.GetOpenId
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class GetOpenId
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    另请参阅:
    This servlet parses params from /wxpay.properties and returns client's openid facing the appid Here how it goes: 1. directly GET this url(which defined by your route file web.xml), either an ajax call or redirect is ok, see instruction below. 2. due to Weixin's spec, client will be redirect to open.weixin.qq.com/blabla to obtain a code 3. we will translate the code into openid and output it Response content-type in step #3 is alternative choice: If it is a redirect request, a redir param is required in step #1, we will append the openid as param and send a 302 response. If it is a ajax request, nothing but directly GET this url is needed. In such case, openid will be output as text/plain. Since open.weixin.qq.com does not contains a cross-domain header, You must A same client will reflect in different openids while it faces different WX service accounts. So DO NOT use this servlet in a multi-instance environment, due to this servlet use a static appid and secret read from the config file. 
        Retrieve current client's openid
    GET /get-openid.api

    Params
    code    :string , generated and passed by open.weixin.qq.com, need not manual handling.
    redir   :url    , if you are doing an redirect and wish the openid returned as param k-v.

    Response
    if redir absent
    Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
    if redir provided
    302 Found
    Location: ${redir[@openid='$openid']}
